languages.text: "То есть если на твоих глазах будут убивать невиновного, от чьей жизни не зависит порядок в Империуме, ты просто пройдешь мимо?"
"So, if you see someone trying to murder an innocent man whose life is irrelevant to maintaining order in the Imperium, you simply walk on by?"
languages.original_text: "То есть если на твоих глазах будут убивать невиновного, от чьей жизни не зависит порядок в Империуме, ты просто пройдешь мимо?"

traits.locale_text: "So, if you see someone trying to murder an innocent man whose life is irrelevant to maintaining order in the Imperium, you simply walk on by?"
"So, if you see someone trying to murder an innocent man whose life is irrelevant to maintaining order in the Imperium, you simply walk on by?"
"So, if you see someone trying to murder an innocent man whose life is irrelevant to maintaining order in the Imperium, you simply walk on by?"
"So, if you see someone trying to murder an innocent man whose life is irrelevant to maintaining order in the Imperium, you simply walk on by?"
"So, if you see someone trying to murder an innocent man whose life is irrelevant to maintaining order in the Imperium, you simply walk on by?"
"So, if you see someone trying to murder an innocent man whose life is irrelevant to maintaining order in the Imperium, you simply walk on by?"

languages.text: 「じゃあ、もし帝国の秩序に関係のない無実の人間が殺されそうになっていても、見て見ぬふりをするってことか？」
languages.original_text: "So, if you see someone trying to murder an innocent man whose life is irrelevant to maintaining order in the Imperium, you simply walk on by?"

traits.locale_text: 「じゃあ、もし帝国の秩序に関係のない無実の人間が殺されそうになっていても、見て見ぬふりをするってことか？」

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr also seht, wie jemand versucht, einen Unschuldigen zu töten, dessen Leben jedoch für die Aufrechterhaltung der Ordnung im Imperium irrelevant ist, dann geht Ihr einfach vorbei?"
languages.original_text: "So, if you see someone trying to murder an innocent man whose life is irrelevant to maintaining order in the Imperium, you simply walk on by?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr also seht, wie jemand versucht, einen Unschuldigen zu töten, dessen Leben jedoch für die Aufrechterhaltung der Ordnung im Imperium irrelevant ist, dann geht Ihr einfach vorbei?"

languages.text: « Et donc, si vous croisiez un innocent sur le point de se faire assassiner, mais que sa vie n'avait aucune importance pour le bon fonctionnement de l'Imperium, vous resteriez les bras croisés ? »
languages.original_text: "So, if you see someone trying to murder an innocent man whose life is irrelevant to maintaining order in the Imperium, you simply walk on by?"

traits.locale_text: « Et donc, si vous croisiez un innocent sur le point de se faire assassiner, mais que sa vie n'avait aucune importance pour le bon fonctionnement de l'Imperium, vous resteriez les bras croisés ? »

languages.text: «¿O sea, que si ve a alguien intentando asesinar a un inocente cuya vida es irrelevante para mantener el orden en el Imperium, se limitaría a pasar de largo?».
languages.original_text: "So, if you see someone trying to murder an innocent man whose life is irrelevant to maintaining order in the Imperium, you simply walk on by?"

traits.locale_text: «¿O sea, que si ve a alguien intentando asesinar a un inocente cuya vida es irrelevante para mantener el orden en el Imperium, se limitaría a pasar de largo?».

languages.text: “也就是说，如果你看到有人打算谋杀无辜的帝国臣民，而受害者的性命与帝国秩序没有太大关系，你会一走了之，对吗？”
languages.original_text: "So, if you see someone trying to murder an innocent man whose life is irrelevant to maintaining order in the Imperium, you simply walk on by?"

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，如果你看到有人打算谋杀无辜的帝国臣民，而受害者的性命与帝国秩序没有太大关系，你会一走了之，对吗？”

languages.text: "Yani hayatı İmparatorluk'taki düzeni korumakla uzaktan yakından alakası olmayan masum bir adamı öldürmeye çalışan birini görürsen öylece yanlarından yürüyüp geçer misin?"
languages.original_text: "So, if you see someone trying to murder an innocent man whose life is irrelevant to maintaining order in the Imperium, you simply walk on by?"

traits.locale_text: "Yani, hayatı İmparatorluk'taki düzeni korumakla uzaktan yakından alakası olmayan masum bir adamı öldürmeye çalışan birini görürsen öylece yanlarından yürüyüp geçer misin?"
